attributes.action: Make it mandatory for fathers to understand the meaning of pre-eclampsia on the loss of a baby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: being a father of a little angel ive still never opened up to anybody about what caused the death of my baby boy. Pre-eclampsia is a 50/50 chance in any childbirth and still to this date i have no idea what  pre-eclampsia is how it is caused or how to handle the time after pre-eclampsia has caused so much upset ! its been the hardest two years of my life.. i think there should be a fathers guide to coping or how to cope after the loss..!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
